debug_msg.label: Show debug messages
debug_msg.tip: Show debug messages in the SiQAD terminal.

log_file_keep_count.label: Log files to keep
log_file_keep_count.tip: Number of old log files to keep.

python_path.label: Python path
python_path.tip: Leave blank to let the application attempt to find a Python interpreter automatically. Arguments are space-separated. e.g. C:\Windows\py.exe -3
